page.title: 06RECREATION IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: 4.AMERSHAM MUSIC CENTRE,based at Amersham College and Brudenell's School, gives instrumental lessons and opportunities to join bands or orchestras. It is open at weekends and Tuesday evenings.Fees are from Â£8 to Â£30 per term.The best musicians receive county scholarships. 5.HAREWOOD DOWNS GOLF CLUB,founded in 1907, has a membership of 330 men,70 women and 160 juniors. Full membership is Â£269.29 +VAT. Hourly lessons with the resident professional are Â£12.An active social side is an added attraction. 6.FOX'S,opened in 1956 as a leisurewear store, added a shoe department in 1965. The present owner is a third-generation Fox. The shop has 7 assistants and deals with about 100 customers a day. The premises cost Â£200,000 a year to run.
